hero.headline: Your Legal Partner to Grow Without Fear
hero.subheadline: Clear, agile, and affordable legal advice for startups and tech SMEs. We integrate into your team so you can innovate without legal friction.

problem.title: The legal hurdle holding back your Startup or Company
points: Contracts that don't protect you and create future risk.
Slow investment processes due to corporate disorganization.
Doubts about intellectual property, data, and expansion that paralyze decisions.

solution.title: The SYG solution: Agility and legal certainty
points: Flexible subscription plans that adapt to your growth stage.
Documentation ready for audits and investment rounds (due diligence).
Direct, jargon-free advice focused on business results.
A legal team that understands technology, product, and venture capital.

services.title: Our Services
services.headline: Legal Solutions for Your Startup's Lifecycle
services.subheadline: From incorporation to global expansion, we've got you covered at every stage.

items.title: Incorporation and Corporate Governance
items.description: We structure your company correctly from day one, paving the way for future investments and solid, scalable corporate management.

items.title: Technology Contracts
items.description: We draft and negotiate your key contracts (SaaS, SLA, DPA, Terms & Privacy) to protect your business and enable sales without friction.

items.title: Investment and Due Diligence
items.description: We assist you in investment rounds (SAFE, notes, term sheets) and organize your data room for a smooth and successful due diligence process.

items.title: Intellectual Property
items.description: We protect your most valuable assets: trademark registration, software protection, and rights assignment management to secure your innovation.

items.title: Regulatory Compliance
items.description: We navigate the regulatory complexity of personal data, fintech, and digital health so you can operate with confidence and in compliance with current regulations.

items.title: International Expansion
items.description: We facilitate your global growth, advising on the legal, tax, and operational structure to open new markets safely and efficiently.

items.quote: “SYG Legal was key to closing our seed round. Their agility and knowledge of the tech ecosystem gave us the confidence to negotiate and grow without fear.”
items.author: Ana Pérez

items.quote: “Finally, a legal team that speaks our language. They helped us launch our SaaS in three countries, with all contracts and policies in record time.”
items.author: Carlos Rodríguez

items.quote: “Flexible legal subscription is a game-changer. We have constant support without worrying about hourly costs. A must-have for any startup.”
items.author: Laura Gómez

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.headline: Flexible Subscription Plans
pricing.subheadline: Choose the plan that fits your growth stage. No surprises, no hidden fees.

items.question: How do subscription plans work and what if I exceed the limits?
items.answer: Our plans offer a set number of hours or documents. If you need more, you can upgrade to the next level or purchase an additional hour package. We aim for total flexibility: you pay only for what you need, with predictable costs for your startup.

items.question: How long does it take to get a response or a contract ready?
items.answer: Our response SLA varies from 24 to 48 hours depending on your plan for inquiries. Drafting a standard contract takes 3 to 5 business days. We prioritize agility so your business doesn't get held up by legal matters.

items.question: My startup is in a regulated sector (fintech/healthtech), do you have experience?
items.answer: Yes, it's one of our specialties. We help startups in regulated sectors to navigate compliance with personal data, licensing, and specific regulations, ensuring your product or service meets all legal requirements from the start.

items.question: Do you help me prepare for an investment round with international VCs?
items.answer: Absolutely. We prepare your data room, review and negotiate term sheets, and ensure your corporate structure is attractive to international investors. Our goal is for you to enter negotiations with a strong position and no surprises.

items.question: Is my trademark registration included in the plans?
items.answer: The Premium plan includes the registration of one trademark in your home country. For other plans, or for registrations in multiple countries, we offer an add-on service with preferential rates. Protecting your brand is a critical investment, and we make it easy for you.

finalCta.headline: Ready to take your startup to the next level?
finalCta.subheadline: Let us handle the legal complexity so you can focus on growth. Schedule a free, no-obligation consultation.

footer.description: Legal partner for startups and tech SMEs. Clear, agile, and affordable advice.
